oracle.pgx.config

Interface TwoTablesGraphConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTwoTablesRdbmsGraphConfig, AbstractTwoTablesSparkGraphConfig, AbstractTwoTablesTextGraphConfig, TwoTablesRdbmsGraphConfig, TwoTablesSparkGraphConfig, TwoTablesTextGraphConfig

    public interface TwoTablesGraphConfig
    Base interface for Two Tables (TWO_TABLES) graph configuration objects
